title: WATCH: Dani Alves sent off after squaring up to referee in PSG defeat at Lyon
description: Paris Saint-Germain's Dani Alves was sent off after squaring up to the referee in their game against Lyon in Ligue 1.
content: Alves received a straight red after aggressively squaring up to referee Clement Turpin when a decision was given against him.Memphis Depay scored with a superb strike deep into injury time as second-placed Lyon beat PSG 2-1 on Sunday, handing the league leaders only their second defeat of the season.PSG had Alves sent off near the hour mark, but seemed assured of securing a point until Depay decided otherwise with 30 seconds left.Coming on as a second-half substitute, the Netherlands forward cut in from the left after collecting a pass from fellow forward Nabil Fekir. Depay moved into space around the penalty area and unleashed a blistering strike from 25 yards into the top left corner.PSG travelled to Lyon on Sunday night without star man Neymar after the Brazil international was sidelined with a thigh injury.Watch Alves' red card in the video above
